level.heading: Aiding or abetting.
level.text: It shall be an unlawful discriminatory practice for any person to aid, abet, invite, compel, or coerce the doing of any of the acts forbidden under the provisions of this chapter or to attempt to do so.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-38, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1401.01.
